short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for Chrome Browser with a simplified mechanism for filling out data in forms on any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is something that will help you simplify the mechanism for filling out data in forms on any website.

After installing the extension, go to settings and create your data preset.

To use, place the cursor in the required input field and press <Ctrl + Space>.

A list of word pairs to insert will appear.
Using the arrows and  Enter, the mouse pointer or search, select the required data for a keyword in a pair.

Having selected the required pair, the drop-down list will close, and the second word from the selected pair will appear in the input field.

To easily switch between presets, you can use the drop-down menu by clicking on the extension icon.

Enjoy your use
